alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains; La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 13 at 2:50PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches possible. Locally higher amounts up to 2 feet possible in the La Sal Mountains. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains and La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Uinta Mountains; La Sal and Abajo Mountains
